GSD.description: udev before 1.4.1 does not verify whether a NETLINK message originates from kernel space, which allows local users to gain privileges by sending a NETLINK message from user space.

description_data.value: udev before 1.4.1 does not verify whether a NETLINK message originates from kernel space, which allows local users to gain privileges by sending a NETLINK message from user space.

reference_data.name: [Security-announce] 20090710 VMSA-2009-0009 ESX Service Console updates for udev, sudo, and curl
